text: Kim Hyo-won (, Hanja 金孝元, 1532 1590), was a Korean scholar, writer, politician, and Neo-Confucian philosopher of the Joseon period.Nussbaum, Louis-Frédéric. (1977). "Gim Hyeo-Wyeong (R.Kim Hyo-won)" in Encyclopaedia of Asian civilizations, Vol. 3, p. 76. ==References== == Other websites == * http://koreandb.nate.com/history/people/detail?sn=8487 * 윤종일교수의 남양주역사기행(26)- 동인(東人) 김효원(金孝元)(남양주타임즈, 2007.01.26자 * Political factions in Korea at Citizendia.org Category:1532 births Category:1590 deaths Category:Korean writers Category:Korean politicians Category:Korean philosophers
title: Kim Hyo-won
